Check if IDBCursor.advance() has normal arguments that expecting this method runs the steps for asynchronously executing a request
Check if IDBCursor.advance() iterate objectstore cursor number of times specified by count
Check if IDBCursor.advance() throws an exception InvalidStateError when the cursor is currently being iterated, or has iterated past its end
Check if IDBCursor.advance() throws an exception TransactionInactiveError when the value passed into the count parameter was zero or a negative number
Check if IDBCursor.advance() throws an exception TypeError when the value passed into the count parameter was zero or a negative number
Check if IDBCursor.continue() throws an exception DataError when the key parameter is greater than or equal to this cursor's position and this cursor's direction is nextunique
Check if IDBCursor.advance() iterate index cursor number of times specified by count
Check if IDBCursor.continue() throws an exception DataError when the key parameter was specified but did not contain a valid key
Check if IDBCursor.continue() throws an exception InvalidStateError when the cursor is currently being iterated, or has iterated past its end
Check if IDBCursor.continue() throws an exception TransactionInactiveError when the transaction this IDBCursor belongs to is not active
Check if iterate to the next record by index
check to pass a key parameter is not a valid key by index

Check if IDBCursor.primaryKey attribute is of type string

Check if IDBCursorWithValue.value is readonly
Check if IDBCursorWithValue.value attribute is of type object

Check if a database connection to be closed, when IDBDatabase.close() is called
Check if IDBDatabase.close() unblock the delete database request
Check if createObjectStore() has two valid arguments that expecting IDBObjectStore object to be created
Check if IDBDatabase.createObjectStore() throws an exception ConstraintError when an object store with the same name, compared in a case-sensitive manner, already exists in the connected database
Check if IDBDatabase.createObjectStore() was not called from a VERSION_CHANGE transaction callback that expecting an exception InvalidStateError to be thrown
Check if IDBDatabase.createObjectStore() throws an exception SyntaxError when keyPath is an Array which any items is an invalid string
Check if IDBDatabase.createObjectStore() throws an exception InvalidAccessError when the keyPath parameter is specified to the empty string
Check if createObjectStore() has a valid argument that expecting an IDBObjectStore object to be created
Check if createObjectStore() has a null argument optionalParameters that expecting an IDBObjectStore object to be created
Check if deleteObjectStore() has a valid argument that expecting the object store to be destroy
Check if IDBDatabase.deleteObjectStore() throws an exception InvalidStateError when deleteObjectStore() was not called from a VERSION_CHANGE transaction callback

Check if IDBDatabase.name attribute is readonly
Check if IDBDatabase.name attribute is of type string
Check if IDBDatabase.objectStoreNames attribute is readonly
Check if IDBDatabase.objectStoreNames attribute is of type DOMStringList

Check if the versionchange event has been triggered that expecting IDBDatabase.onversionchange handler to be invoked
Check if transaction() has two valid arguments that expecting an IDBTransaction object to be created
Check if IDBDatabase.transaction was called with an empty list of store names that expecting an exception InvalidAccessError to be thrown

Check if one of the names provided in the storeNames argument doesn't exist in this database that expecting an exception NotFoundError to be thrown
Check if transaction() has a valid argument that expecting an IDBTransaction object to be created
Check if the return type of IDBDatabase.transaction is IDBTransaction

Check if IDBDatabase.version attribute is of type number

Check if IDBEnvironment.indexedDB attribute is of type IDBFactory
